voices.mp3Text: I speak softly, but carry a sharp knife.
Heh-ho, you didn't see that coming.
I speak softly, but carry a sharp knife.
Since you put it like that.

text: Only when distance is at least 2x the cast range, 4 seconds cooldown

voices.mp3Text: Heh heh heh ha he heh

text: Upon leveling, requires Blink Strike to be level 1

voices.mp3Text: Expect to see less of me.
If you can see me, you're already dead.
Heh-ho, you didn't see that coming.
You were my target all along.
Anyone could see that it was your time.
I do my work at the cutting edge.
What you see is what gets you.
There are none so stabbed as those who will not see.
I'd have done that one for free.
They got a bargain when they hired me.
Oh you're dead. What a surprise.
Ho heh heh ho heh heh heh.
He he he he he he he.

Heh-ha heh heh heh heh heh.
Hah he he heh heh heh ha huh haaaah.
Heh heh heh heh heh heh heh.

text: Requires visible enemy player within 1000 radius, 60 seconds cooldown

voices.mp3Text: Not for the likes of you.
Ohah yes, a sound investment in my trade.
Even death can't find me now.
I didn't want to be seen like this.
How the hell did you see me?
Good assassins never die…they just fade away.
Someone took a contract out on me?
That last hit didn't go so well.
Let me take another stab at this.
The night creeps in, and so do I.
I've been here the whole time.
My skill set is narrow, but very sharp.
Heh-ha heh heh heh heh heh he heh.

text: Third and more attempts within 10 seconds
Third and more attempts within 10 seconds

voices.mp3Text: You choose your friends. Sometimes your enemies choose you.
It says right in my contract, no refunds.
There are none so stabbed as those who will not see.
I will avenge my family's slaughter. I'm not just doing this for fun, you know.
